metadata.title: CVE-2022-2907 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 12.9 before 15.1.6, all versions starting from 15.2 before15.2.4, all versions starting from 15.3 before 15.3.2. It was possible toread repository content by an unauthorised user if a project member used acrafted link.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
